summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Bright Street, from 6th Avenue Northwest to Leary Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7574 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
